content:
The examples at Section 4.6.14.2.1 of http://hl7-fhir.github.io/codesystem-operations.html and Section 4.1.5.6 of
http://hl7-fhir.github.io/terminology-service.html still show the 'old' parameter names codeSub, codingSub, codeSuper & codingSuper, rather than codeA, codingA, codeB and codingB.

Thanks for those corrections, but I've also just noticed that the sentence at the top of the example at Section 4.1.5.6 at http://hl7-fhir.github.io/terminology-service.html, isn't the test that's implemented in the following code - i.e. it uses 2 different SCT concepts (and might produce a different result?).
Has anyone else implemented this operation (or $infer) in the STU3 FHIR 1.6.0 versions of their Terminology Server? Are we going to be testing this at the Baltimore Connectathon?
no but very soon, and yes we will be testing it
